channel.title: DIY on Fraktured Space
channel.description: Recent content in DIY on Fraktured Space

item.title: 5 DIY Tech Projects for Beginners
item.description: Technology has become an essential part of our daily lives. With the rise of smart devices, people are looking for ways to enhance their homes with tech.

item.title: Home Assistant Armbian Install
item.description: Armbian is a Debian-based operating system designed for ARM-based devices. It is an excellent choice for those who want to run a lightweight and efficient operating system on their single-board computer or other ARM-based devices.
